amendment.description: To set aside funds for the 400 Years of African-American History Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1211 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1211 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Blunt to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6314) To set aside funds for the 400 Years of African-American History Commission.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1211 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1211 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Blunt to Amendment SA 948.
